page.title: 06 KINSON COMMON
page.content: { } Kinson Common is approximately 43 acres of land enclosed by Poole Lane, South Kinson Drive,Kinson Road and Kinson school field.On the Common you can find wild flowers,birds,trees and butterflies.On the Common there are different habitats like Wet Heathlands and Swampland. The Wet Heathland contains wild orchids like the Heath Spotted Orchid and the Marsh Orchid.Also the Wet Heathland contains frogs,newts,snakes and lizards. Dragon Hollow is low lying swampland draining into a pond.In the Hollow you can find rare Damsel Flies.
